column4: linux is not windows.  however if linux wants to compete with windows on a global market they need to help facilitate the user experience, which is what ubuntu is all about
sorry Jack_Sparrow, thanks for the help, i'm moving on just thought this was the place to get support for ubuntu and thought that if it could be done this channel would know how.  thanks
